title: Pixel Backup to Google Drive - Backup Now button greyed out shows Waiting to Backup
content: I noticed in settings that Backup to Google Drive is active but the Backup Now button was greyed out.  The Active backups all show "Waiting to Backup" except Contacts showing 2 hours ago and Photos showing yesterday.  Verifed that all SYNC options were set.  Looked into Google Drive and Backup folder had last backup 56 days ago.  So.  I reset the backup to Google Drive option off and on and rebooted phone. SO Google drive no longer shows a backup file from 56 days ago in Google Drive. Updated System software to Feb update. No change.  BTW I have WIFI 100GB access. I also tried Safe Mode, checked device and Google drive for plenty of storage. Still none of these things worked.
